name: Mukesh Murugan
bio: Software Engineer, Blogger & Open Source Contributor working on .NET, Golang, AWS, and other related technologies.

projects.name: Full Stack Hero .NET 7 Web API Boilerplate
projects.description: fullstackhero's .NET Web API Boilerplate is a starting point for your next .NET 7 Clean Architecture Project that incorporates the most essential packages and features your projects will ever need including out of the box Multi-Tenancy support. This project can save well over 200+ hours of development time for your team.
